solution_line_template: Three times more wrinkles than three eyes is {wrinkles_multiplier}*{lizard_eyes}=<<{wrinkles_multiplier}*{lizard_eyes}={num_wrinkles}>>{num_wrinkles} wrinkles.
Seven times more spots than wrinkles is {spots_multiplier}*{num_wrinkles}=<<{spots_multiplier}*{num_wrinkles}={num_spots}>>{num_spots} spots.
Therefore, the combined number of spots and wrinkles on the lizard is {num_spots}+{num_wrinkles}=<<{num_spots}+{num_wrinkles}={combined_spots_wrinkles}>>{combined_spots_wrinkles} spots and wrinkles.
Thus, the lizard has {combined_spots_wrinkles}-{lizard_eyes}={fewer_eyes} fewer eyes than spots and wrinkles
